data.actual_result: Pop up keeps showing every time you hit "okay", and you can't exit the My Account menu without saving changes or closing the app
data.expected_result: Discard unsaved changes pop up shows once, and when you hit "okay", you are returned to the user settings menu
data.short_description: Discard unsaved changes pop up keeps reappearing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to "My Account" in user settings and make a change (ex: remove a letter from your name) - Press the back button/arrow to exit out of the settings screen without hitting save
